items.sentence: Make sure that the lights are turned off before you leave.
Tom said that he and Mary would probably be a little late.
Tom and Mary promised me that they\'d never do that again.
Tom doesn\'t have to talk about it if he doesn\'t want to.
Is there something in your room you don\'t want me to see?
Didn\'t you know Tom lived in Australia when he was a kid?
This is a sentence that has the syllable count of a haiku.
Tom accused Mary of stealing his money, but she denied it.
Tom adds a little money to his savings account each month.
Tom admitted that he always has trouble remembering names.
